name: You Are NOT Bunnygirl - Demo
description:
You Are NOT Bunnygirl is an RPG about self-care! Manage Physical and Emotional Health as you guide Bunnygirl through a lab of malfunctioning robots.

You can't actually lose, because it's a game, but you should protect Bunnygirl anyways because she might not appreciate it if you don't.

For now, the game is just a demo.  I am working hard to make the full game a reality.  Support the game by Wishlisting on Steam or following on Twitter!
